technologies.name: NVIDIA
technologies.description: Leading GPU technology and AI acceleration platforms

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: NVIDIA is at the forefront of AI hardware and software, providing powerful GPUs and development platforms.

sections.title: Key Products
sections.content: Groq, CUDA, TensorRT, and Jetson platforms enable high-performance AI computing.

technologies.name: Anthropic
technologies.description: Advanced AI safety and large language models

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Anthropic focuses on building safe, helpful, and honest AI systems through Constitutional AI.

sections.title: Key Products
sections.content: Claude is a next-generation AI assistant designed to be helpful, harmless, and honest.

technologies.name: OpenAI
technologies.description: Pioneering generative AI and language models

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: OpenAI develops cutting-edge AI models that power a wide range of applications.

sections.title: Key Products
sections.content: GPT-4, DALL-E, ChatGPT, and other models enable text generation, image creation, and more.
